items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So worth it!!
items.body: This dress was so nice for a formal occasion though I am sure I can also dress it down slightly for a semi formal occasion. The fabric was soft and super flowy which made it fit so much better. The dress is correctly sized which is nice and not too long, even on my short frame. The color was great, and washing it was simple, which is always a plus. It’s not a dress that wrinkles easily which is also amazing. I really recommend this for someone looking for a formal dress ! Read more
items.author: Jessica Pham

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very beautiful for a modest look!
items.body: its flowy comes just how it describes there's no need for adjustments if your 5.4 it will stop at your ankles . You can pair it with flats, sandals or heels . Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: I love this dress!! I wore it to a wedding and it was perfect! Great quality! I wore it with GOLD shoes. :) Read more
items.author: Sean Wilson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Order down
items.body: Order down a size. Beautiful fabric and fits really well for being a bit big in the bust area for me Read more
items.author: addy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty. Dress
items.body: I like it very much. It's week made and looks great. Read more
items.author: P. Rea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A new favorite dress!
items.body: The dress was amazing, and it arrived early! I'm 5'1", and I ordered a small/size 4. The dress was originally floor length, but I got it hemmed to ankle length. The sleeves hit just at my wrists, but I would've liked them to be a bit longer so they didn't slide up when I reached my arms out. That's personal preference & a very minor detail though. The fit on me was great, just like the photos, and it was flowy, breathable, and good quality! Read more
items.author: Hannah

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Orchid, Burgundy, Black, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
